segments.text: How many languages can you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can speak French and German .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How well can you speak them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can speak German quite well , but I can't speak French very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you help me to translate these sentences into German now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I'll be able to tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
